title: Egypt
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,288 words, Level U (Grade 4), Lexile 820L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and X
description: The pyramids of Giza are some of the wonders of the ancient world, but Egypt has many more things to learn about. In Egypt, students will read about the country's people, deserts and other landforms, and the animals that live there. Pictures and maps enhance the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
